detail.content: NYU Stern | Final Exam Schedule                       Final Exam Schedule              For Langone classes, final exams (if given) will be scheduled for    the last class meeting.      Final exams are held in the same room as where the class meets unless    otherwise noted.      Accounting Courses that are cross-listed with an undergraduate course    number and meet during an undergraduate time period will follow    the undergraduate exam schedule.      Please refer to your professor for updates since this is a general listing. NYU Stern | Refund & Withdrawal Dates                       Refund & Withdrawal Dates              The refund schedule listed below is based on the total applicable    charge for tuition excluding non-refundable fees and deposits.    Per course refunds do not apply to full-time students who pay    "flat rate tuition fee".     There are no tuition refunds if the class is dropped after the    last day of 100% refund listed below. Workshop (Business Writing)    and Prep Courses (Accounting and Math) are refundable if you drop    prior to the start of each workshop.     For Intensive or Alternate Delivery classes, there will be no    tuition & fees refund after the second class starts. The last day to    drop an Intensive or Alternate Delivery class with a 100% tuition    refund is before the class meeting time on the date listed below.    A Drop is done on or before the last day to drop and the course is    deleted from the transcript.     A Withdrawal is done after the last day to drop (between the    last day to drop and the last day to withdraw) and the course appears    on the transcript with a non-punitive grade of "W". There is no refund    for a withdrawal and students will have to pay for the additional    credits they must take to make up for the "W". NYU Stern | Refund & Withdrawal Dates                       Refund & Withdrawal Dates              The refund schedule listed below is based on the total applicable    charge for tuition excluding non-refundable fees and deposits.    Per course refunds do not apply to full-time students who pay    "flat rate tuition fee".     There are no tuition refunds if the class is dropped after the    last day of 100% refund listed below. Workshop (Business Writing)    and Prep Courses (Accounting and Math) are refundable if you drop    prior to the start of each workshop.     For Intensive or Alternate Delivery classes, there will be no    tuition & fees refund after the second class starts. The last day to    drop an Intensive or Alternate Delivery class with a 100% tuition    refund is before the class meeting time on the date listed below.    A Drop is done on or before the last day to drop and the course is    deleted from the transcript.     A Withdrawal is done after the last day to drop (between the    last day to drop and the last day to withdraw) and the course appears    on the transcript with a non-punitive grade of "W". There is no refund    for a withdrawal and students will have to pay for the additional    credits they must take to make up for the "W".
